member.name: IUserNotificationCallback.OnBalloonUserClick
member.summary: Called when the user clicks the balloon. The application may respond with an action that is suitable for the balloon being clicked.
member.param: Takes a pointer to the structure which, upon method return, points to the position of the mouse in screen space where the mouse click occurred.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUserNotificationCallback.OnContextMenu
member.summary: Called when the user right-clicks (or presses SHIFT+F10) the icon in the notification area. The application should show its context menu in response.

param.name: pt
param.para: When returned by the method, takes a pointer to the structure at the position of the mouse in the screen space where the click occurred.
In the case where user presses SHIFT+F10, the pointer points to the center of the icon in the screen space.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUserNotificationCallback.OnLeftClick
member.summary: Called when the user clicks the icon in the notification area. The applications may launch some customary UI in response.
member.param: Takes a pointer to the structure which, when the method returns, points to the position of the mouse in the screen space where the mouse click occurred.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUserNotificationCallback
member.summary: Exposes a method for the handling of a mouse click or shortcut menu access in a notification balloon. Used with .
